{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = http://support.linksys.com/us/support-product?pid=01t80000003K7fhAAC |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Cisco |model = AM10 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 3, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Cisco_Valet_AM10 |sernum = |wlclass = N300 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 13b1 |device_id = 0031 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = Q87-AM10 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 68:7F:74 |chip1 = Ralink;RT3072; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WN7522E |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = install flash drive |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/10/2010 |estreldate = 03/31/2010 |estprice = |upc = 745883589425 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833186012 |asin = B003B41XYO |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 2x2 MIMO
Single-Band
"Self-installs directly from USB" - it has a built in flash drive with drivers
USB_ModeSwitch is required for the device to work in Linux - see [http://www.draisberghof.de/usb_modeswitch/bb/viewtopic.php?t=635 this topic] on the USB_ModeSwitch forum. "P/N: 141752220007J R01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{WiFiCert|WFA8380|12/30/2009}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
